mapper.delete: delete from out_demand_plan od where demand_id = #{demandId}
mapper.select: select * from out_demand_plan od where demand_id = #{demandId}
mapper.insert: insert into out_demand_plan ( demand_id,demand_code, is_change,create_time, create_user_id,create_user_name, demand_source,data_source, demand_state,demand_org_id, demand_direction,wbs_code,wbs_name,reason,wbs_id,change_reason ) values ( #{demandId},#{demandCode}, #{isChange},#{createTime}, #{createUserId},#{createUserName}, #{demandSource},#{dataSource}, #{demandState},#{demandOrgId}, #{demandDirection},#{wbsCode},#{wbsName},#{reason},#{wbsId},#{changeReason} )
